strapiPost.title: Get Geared Up
strapiPost.content:
beardedgoat exists to get more people on the water, mountains, roads, and trails. Bridging the gap between technical and everyday apparel, they're making products you can wear regardless of your activity or climate.

They are also in the process of building out a new flagship store on the Fayetteville Square, but before it's finished they need your help to make room by clearing out some of everyone's favorite styles from past seasons. Swing by their (unfinished) new store tomorrow (March 27), and cash in on the cheapest beardedgoat deals you'll ever find.

  • WHAT: beardedgoat Pre Move-In Sale
  • WHERE: 15 S. Block Ave #102 (on the Fayetteville Square, right next to City Supply)
  • WHEN: Saturday 3/27 from 8am-2pm (during the Farmer's Market)
  • WHO: you and all your friends
  • WHY: everything will be $10, $20, or $30
